record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Paint and marker all over the surface of the image. Newspaper caption glued to back, covering part of copyright stamp. Photographer's stamp/Stamp: credit line. Stamp: date received.
record.noteCopyright: Notice: This picture is the property of Wide World Photo, Inc. and may be used only for the purpose of reproduction only when authorized by the owner and is not to be syndicated, rented or loaned. The following must be stamped on each reproduction of this picture: Wide World Photo.
